structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Budget Preparation; Co Operation Of Comptroller's Office
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] In the exercise of the budget director's and commissioner of capital asset management and maintenance functions relative to the preparation of the budget, the records, resources and full co-operation of the office of the comptroller shall be available. Chapter 7A: Budget preparation; co-operation of comptroller's office [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 80 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] In the exercise of the budget director's functions relative to the preparation of the budget, the records, resources and full co-operation of the office of the comptroller shall be available.
